item.description:
Drumroll Please...

Connect.AMABoston is celebrating 2000 Members!

****************************************
This is a special invitation to the #BIMM community to join us - learn how AMA Connect became such a success and get a look at Performable's technology offerings.  If you haven't joined the Connect Community yet, please check it out at the link below!  Building community is such an important part of today's internet marketing equation - come see what works and what's required to make it a success.

*****************************************************************
It's time to meet your fellow Connect members in person, and celebrate the 2 year anniversary of AMA Boston's online community--now one of the largest and most successful marketing and social media communities in the country!

Come join your fellow marketers who have helped make Connect.AMABoston.org a truly remarkable marketing community for a fun evening of networking at the offices of Performable, Cambridge's hottest marketing automation and analytics startup.

Our guest of honor is Myles Bristowe, Connect Community Creator, AMA Past-President, and CMO at CommCreative, who will be on hand to share his insights on social media, community building, and fun marketing programs. We'll also be joined by the AMA Boston Membership & Social Media teams, who'll have an exciting program announcement exclusively for members of the American Marketing Association.


Where: Performable, 486 Green St. Cambridge

Date: Monday, May 9, 2011

Time: 6:00 p.m. – 8:00 p.m.

Parking Information: Limited street parking

This event is free.

Please RSVP to this event here: http://connect2000.eventbrite.com/


Hashtag: #amabtua  #BIMM
item.how_to_find_us: Performable headquarters - 486 Green St. Cambridge, near Central Square
item.why: As many of you know I have been a volunteer with the American Marketing Association for many years and have been actively involved on the Social Media Team and the AMA.Connect Community since it's inception. We are hitting a HUGE milestone here....
item.name: Celebrate the AMA Connect Community reaching 2000 Members!
